info.name: Mozillazine Dark Theme
info.description: I'm sure this isn't the only dark theme for the Mozillazine forums, but this is what I use. It's for personal use, but feel free to use it. It's unfinished, but if people start using it I'll probably work on it more.
info.additionalInfo:
[2011-11-2]
- Temporarily added the icons to the forum index. Needs to be different
than the ones on the forums
- Tweaked the style on the forum index. I'm pretty happy with how it
looks along with the new style for icons.
- Made some tweaks on the forums to match the index changes
- Fixed some alignment issues in the forum pagination div
- Adjusted base font size to more closely match the default theme's size
- Added some test icons. They look cleaner, but I need to come up
with a better idea for "hot", "locked", etc. variations

[2011-10-26]
- Fixed bugs with pagination styling
- Adjusted font color for "Edited by" text

Hopefully I'll get around to fixing the icons soon. They're an eyesore.

[2011-10-07]
- Added margins to forum groups for better separation
- Fixed padding and other styling tweaks for forum groups
- Fixed style for the search/pagination area at the top of forums (added bug where some page links aren't styled right in threads anymore)
- Made hovered links more uniform (no more red links AFAIK. More inconsistencies still need to be fixed)
